title: Cap Streamers, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap streamers of Mechlin lace in a design of an asymmetrical "pearled" serpentine band, intertwined at intervals by floral and foliated forms. Fond: drochel (Brussels mesh). Modes: fond de neige, maille carrée, portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamers, 1700–50.
1700–50. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-54-a,b.
